description:
CROW, the Central Office Battle Corps, is an elite group of humans from http://anidb.net/ch32502 [Central] who act as special enforcers. Though they are not endowed with Innocence, they possess unique skills and the ability to cast powerful spells to bind their enemies. Regular members of CROW are capable of temporarily hindering Akuma and preventing Exorcists from using their Innocence.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki
name: CROW
